name: Monster League Soccer 2023
description:
Welcome to Monster League Soccer! this is a game where you need to kick the ball to maneuver the Level and score goals!

you have a certain amount of kicks before the ball explodes and you lose! 

WASD to move, and Click to Kick! the farther away your mouse is from the ball, the harder the kick!

Press R to reload the level, and quick reminder, you CANT shoot backwards, it doesn't work :(
